item.title: About Me
item.description:
Hi! I’m a passionate developer learning new things every day. This blog documents my journey, showcases my projects, and shares some of my photography.

My Background

I have a background in…

Tech Stack

  • Languages: Python, JavaScript, Go
  • Tools: Hugo, Git, VS Code

item.title: Automating with GitHub Actions
item.description: Setting up a workflow to deploy my Hugo site automatically.

item.title: Mastering CSS Variables
item.description: Exploring the power of CSS variables for theming.

item.title: Learning Hugo Basics
item.description: Today I started learning Hugo, a fast static site generator.

item.title: Personal Portfolio
item.description:
This is the project you are looking at right now! It’s a custom-built Hugo theme designed for speed and simplicity.

Features

  • Fast Loading: No heavy frameworks, just vanilla HTML/CSS.
  • SEO Optimized: Includes OpenGraph, Twitter Cards, and Schema.org data.
  • Dark Mode: Built-in dark mode support using CSS variables.
  • Responsive: Looks great on mobile and desktop.

item.title: Weather App
item.description:
A React-based weather application that fetches real-time weather data.

Key Learnings

  • Fetching data from REST APIs.
  • Managing state with React Hooks.
  • Handling asynchronous operations.
